Package org.microbean.jackson.cdi

Provides classes and interfaces for working with Jackson from within CDI environments.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JacksonCdiExtension
    An Extension that permits ObjectMapper instances to be injected in CDI-based applications.

Package org.microbean.jackson.cdi Description

Provides classes and interfaces for working with Jackson from within CDI environments.
Author:
Laird Nelson
